==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|だ|そく|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
From {{ja-compound|蛇|だ|足|そく|t1=snake|t2=foot}}, literally meaning snake's foot (which is useless).

Might be a contraction of {{ja-r|画%蛇 添%足|が%だ てん%そく}}, which is from the Chinese idiom {{zh-l|畫蛇添足}}.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|だそく|y=o}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|だそく}}

# something [[useless]]; [[unnecessary]]; [[superfluous]]
